name: 水彩（二）
goals: 傳達與表現所需之專業技術
syllabus:
**課程介紹** **(Course Description)**:

使一年級新生能熟悉水彩媒材, 並能了解各種表現技法與技法背後所闡述之精神, 進而刺激進階創作思想.

For first level of undergraduate students, to learn how to manage the watercolor or other related materials is very crucial. Then to inspire them to develop their own language.

**課程進度** **(Weekly Schedule)**:

1\. 課程概述與水彩創作概念

    Course Instruction, the exploration of idea in watercolor

2\. 創作訓練與習作 (A)

    Exploration, strategy and practice (A)

3\. 創作訓練與習作( B)

    Exploration, strategy and practice (B)

4\. 課堂習作與批評( A)

    Studio practice and group critic (A)

5\. 課堂習作與批評 (B)

    Studio practice and group critic (B)

6\. 色彩與造型

    Colour and style

7\. 具象繪畫 

    Realistic depiction

8\. 抽象繪畫 

    Abstract depiction

9\. 自由繪畫創作 

    Individual language

10\. 期中作品評論與意見交換

      Group critic (Midterm)

11\. 創作發想 (A)

      Studio practice (A)

12\. 創作發想 (B)

      Studio practice (B)

13\. 作品評論與意見交換

      Group critic

14\. 水彩媒材之於個人創作之關係

      Personal language and materials

15\. 水彩創作( A)

      Studio practice (A)

16\. 水彩創作 (B)

      Studio practice (B)

17\. 水彩創作 (C)

      Studio practice (C)

18\. 期末作品評鑑

      Group critic (Final)

Due to the effect of COVID-19, this course provides video record of class regularly to students who temporarily stay in China, Hong Kong and Macao.

According to the harsh situation of pandemic, long distance teaching will be applies to all students of this course as well.
